trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** eventos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs é utilizada para fornecer valores de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>eventos e que lhe permite especificar uma identidade personalizada do Windows para o pedido atual.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>eventos do <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>classe, especificando um subroutine com o nome **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** no ficheiro global. asax para a sua aplicação ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs a AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>constrói um objeto de AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs utilizando atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e passa-o para o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** eventos.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>propriedade do objeto AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs fornecido para o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** eventos para definir o identificador de anónimo para um valor personalizado.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>propriedade durante o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento, um <xref:System.Guid>é utilizado.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento apenas é gerado quando a identificação anónima é <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>Constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>objeto utilizando <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> atual</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, passa o <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>de objeto para o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** eventos.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: O contexto para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the anonymous identifier for the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o identificador de anónimo para o utilizador.

trans-unit.source: You can use the AnonymousID property to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a propriedade AnonymousID para definir o identificador de anónimo para um valor personalizado durante a **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** eventos.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the AnonymousID property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se não especificar um valor para a propriedade AnonymousID durante o **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento, um <xref:System.Guid>é utilizado.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento apenas é gerado quando a identificação anónima é <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The anonymous identifier for the user.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de anónimo para o utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para o atual pedido HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>fornece acesso às <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>objetos para o pedido atual.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto para o atual pedido HTTP.
